title: Savoury marrow bake
ingredients: ['100g plain flour', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon caster sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '50g freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '1 tablespoon minced fresh parsley', '1/2 tablespoon chopped fresh oregano', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil', '4 eggs', '125ml olive or vegetable oil', '1 onion, chopped', '450g grated marrow, squeezed dry']
